comment.author: 63493070@N02
comment._content: The gentleman on the left is Dr. Thomas C. Young, (prominent surgeon) Glendale, California. President of the California Aeronautical Association- mid-twenties, member of the Sheriff's Aero Squadron, and owner of the then famous "Wedding Ship" (not shown) in which many a wedding was performed over L.A.in the air. The gentleman on the right, is of course, the famous aviator Jack Frye (friend of Young) the location is likely Burdett operations, Western Avenue, date 1925.
